column4: guys any reccomendation as to which *box to use? Im using Openbox but since have no knowledge of XML, cant mess around with it... just downloaded flux box... will check it out what to do.
so any suggestions befor i begin?
I can indeed recommend Fluxbox. Great WM - easy to customize - but you will probably need to do a little reading. Try google - don't have my links with me today :)
